articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Kyiv reveals total Ukraine casualties in Putin’s war for first time - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Zelenskyy said 43,000 Ukrainian soldiers have been killed and 370,000 wounded. That compares with 600,000 dead and wounded reported for Russia.
articles.content: Since the beginning of the full-scale war, Ukraine has lost 43,000 soldiers who died on the battlefield," plus 370,000 who have been wounded, Zelenskyy said in his post. "And this is taking into acco… [+1106 chars]
